job:
echo "Starting the job" ls -alh hostname
starpro echo $STAR echo $OPTSTAR
cons root4star -l -q -b __MACRO__\(\"$FILELIST\",$INPUTFILECOUNT,\"$SCRATCH/$JOBID.root\",\"__CONFIG__\"\) |& cat > log.txt
./rlog.sh log.txt log_red.txt 1200 cat log_red.txt
rm log.txt rm log_red.txt
__INPUT__
__BASEDIR__/sched
file:__SRCDIR__/__MACRO__ file:__SRCDIR__/TArgumentParser.h file:__CONFDIR__/__CONFIG__ file:__CONFDIR__/rlog.sh file:__SRCDIR__/StRoot
